examples.example: 我每天都认真完成作业，感觉很有成就感。

translate.english: I finish my homework carefully every day and feel a great sense of accomplishment.

examples.example: 我认真地对待每一项作业，从中收获了知识与成长。

translate.english: I treat every assignment seriously and gain knowledge and growth from it.

examples.example: 我高效地完成作业后，便可以开心地去做自己喜欢的事情了。

translate.english: After I finish my homework efficiently, I can happily go and do the things I like.
